attributes.action: Repeal the law levying business rates on empty property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think it grossly unfair that owners of empty offices and workshops should have to pay business rates when 
1. There is no income
2. No service is received
3. Because of the recession there are no tenants
4.The result is bringing about destruction of properties to avoid the tax resembling bombsite  Britain

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
